mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.sjh AS "sjh", a.unionid AS "unionid", a.yhtx AS "yhtx", a.sfz AS "sfz", a.xm AS "xm", a.xb AS "xb", a.mz AS "mz", a.csrq AS "csrq", a.yx AS "yx", a.zcsj AS "zcsj", a.fssj AS "fssj", a.yzm AS "yzm", a.prov AS "prov", a.city AS "city", a.area AS "area", a.dlzh AS "dlzh", a.dlzhsj AS "dlzhsj", a.sw_zh AS "swZh", a.sw_mm AS "swMm", a.qxzy AS "qxzy", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.yh_dlzh AS "yhDlzh", a.yh_dlmm AS "yhDlmm", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_yhxx( owid, sjh, unionid, yhlx, yhtx, sfz, xm, xb, mz, csrq, yx, zcsj, fssj, yzm, prov, city, area, dlzh, dlzhsj, sw_zh, sw_mm, qxzy, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, yh_dlzh, yh_dlmm, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{sjh}, #{unionid}, #{yhlx}, #{yhtx}, #{sfz}, #{xm}, #{xb}, #{mz}, #{csrq}, #{yx}, #{zcsj}, #{fssj}, #{yzm}, #{prov}, #{city}, #{area}, #{dlzh}, #{dlzhsj}, #{swZh}, #{swMm}, #{qxzy}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{yhDlzh}, #{yhDlmm}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_yhxx SET owid = #{owid}, sjh = #{sjh}, unionid = #{unionid}, yhtx = #{yhtx}, sfz = #{sfz}, xm = #{xm}, xb = #{xb}, mz = #{mz}, csrq = #{csrq}, yx = #{yx}, zcsj = #{zcsj}, fssj = #{fssj}, yzm = #{yzm}, prov = #{prov}, city = #{city}, area = #{area}, dlzh = #{dlzh}, dlzhsj = #{dlzhsj}, sw_zh = #{swZh}, sw_mm = #{swMm}, qxzy = #{qxzy}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, yh_dlzh = #{yhDlzh}, yh_dlmm = #{yhDlmm}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select: SELECT a.OWID as "owid" ,a.YHTX as "yhtx", a.SJH as "sjh",b.OLX as "olx" ,b.XSXM as "xsxm" ,b.XSXH as "xsxh", a.YH_DLZH as "yhDlzh" , a.YH_DLMM as "yhDlmm",a.sfz as sfz,a.xm as xm FROM bckj_biz_yhxx a , bckj_biz_yhkz b WHERE a.`OWID`=b.`YH_REF_OWID` AND a.`YH_DLZH`=#{yhDlzh};

SELECT a.OWID as "owid" ,a.YHTX as "yhtx", a.SJH as "sjh",b.OLX as "olx" ,b.XSXM as "xsxm" ,b.XSXH as "xsxh", a.YH_DLZH as "yhDlzh" , a.YH_DLMM as "yhDlmm",a.sfz as sfz,a.xm as xm FROM bckj_biz_yhxx a , bckj_biz_yhkz b WHERE a.`OWID`=b.`YH_REF_OWID` AND a.sfz=#{yhDlzh};
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_yhxx SET YH_DLMM=#{yhDlmm} where OWID=#{owid};
update bckj_biz_yhxx set dlzhsj=now() where owid = #{value}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.owid as owid ,b.xsxh as xsxh , c.ksh as ksh, a.xm as xm ,a.xb as xb , b.xszy as xszy ,b.xsxy as xsxy ,d.zydh_One as zydhOne ,d.zydh_Two as zydhTwo , d.zydh_Three as zydhThree ,d.zydh_Four as zydhFour ,d.zydh_Five as zydhFive, d.zydh_Six as zydhSix, a.csrq as csrq , c.zzmm as zzmm ,a.mz as mz , d.kslb as kslb, d.bylb as bylb, d.zxdm as zxdm , d.zxmc as zxmc , d.syddm as syddm ,c.syd as syd , a.sfz as sfz , c.jtdz as jtdz , c. jtyb as jtyb , a.sjh as sjh ,c.jtdh as jtdh, d.kstc as kstc ,d.hjqk as hjqk, d.sjr as sjr , d.tdcj as tdcj ,d.tdzy as tdzy, d.xkkm as xkkm ,d.yw as yw ,d.sx as sx , d.wy as wy , d.wl as wl , d.hx as hx , d.sw as sw , d.zz as zz, d.ls as ls , d.zhcj as zhcj ,d.tkmscj as tkmscj , d.tkbycj as tkbycj ,d.tkszcj as tkszcj , c.xz as xz ,d.km as km ,d.pc as pc , a.prov as prov ,d.memo as memo , d.sg as sg ,d.tz as tz, d.jf as jf FROM `bckj_biz_yhxx` a ,`bckj_biz_yhkz` b,bckj_biz_syb c , bckj_biz_studentinfo d
a.owid = b.`YH_REF_OWID` AND b.`OLX`=#{olx} and a.yhlx=1 and b.xsxh=c.xh and b.xsxh=d.xsxh
and a.xm like CONCAT('%',#{xm},'%')
and b.xsxh like CONCAT('%',#{xsxh},'%')
and a.sfz like CONCAT('%',#{sfz},'%')
and d.zxmc like CONCAT('%',#{zxmc},'%')
and b.xszy like CONCAT('%',#{xszy},'%')
and d.pc like CONCAT('%',#{pc},'%')
and c.ksh like CONCAT('%',#{ksh},'%')
and a.sjh like CONCAT('%',#{sjh},'%')
and c.zzmm like CONCAT('%',#{zzmm},'%')
and c.syd like CONCAT('%',#{syd},'%')
order by b.xsxh asc

SELECT a.owid as owid ,a.sjh as sjh ,a.yhlx as yhlx, a.sfz as sfz , a.xm as xm, a.xb as xb , a.mz as mz, a.csrq as csrq ,a.yx as yx , a.zcsj as zcsj,a.fssj as fssj,a.yzm as yzm,a.prov as prov,a.city as city, a.area as area,a.dlzh as dlzh,a.dlzhsj as dlzhsj,a.YH_DLZH as yhDlzh,a.YH_DLMM as yhDlmm,c.zjzw as zjzw, c.zjbgs as zjbgs,c.szxy as szxy,c.szzy as szzy FROM `bckj_biz_yhxx` a ,`bckj_biz_zjzx` c
a.owid = b.`YH_REF_OWID` and a.owid = c.yhid AND b.`OLX`=#{olx} and a.yhlx=1
and a.xm like CONCAT('%',#{xm},'%')
and b.xsxh like CONCAT('%',#{xsxh},'%')
and a.sfz like CONCAT('%',#{sfz},'%')
order by b.xsxh desc

SELECT a.owid as owid ,a.sjh as sjh ,a.yhlx as yhlx, a.sfz as sfz , a.xm as xm, a.xb as xb , a.mz as mz, a.csrq as csrq ,a.yx as yx , a.zcsj as zcsj,a.fssj as fssj,a.yzm as yzm,a.prov as prov,a.city as city, a.area as area,a.dlzh as dlzh,a.dlzhsj as dlzhsj,a.YH_DLZH as yhDlzh,a.YH_DLMM as yhDlmm,b.olx as olx, b.xsxh as xsxh, b.xsxy as xsxy, xsbj as xsbj,b.xsnj as xsnj,b.xsxm as xsxm,b.lxr as lxr, b.memo as memo FROM `bckj_biz_yhxx` a ,`bckj_biz_yhkz` b WHERE a.owid = b.`YH_REF_OWID` AND b.`OLX`=0 and a.yhlx=1
SELECT a.sfz AS sfz FROM `bckj_biz_yhxx` a where a.sfz is not null
SELECT a.sjh AS sjh FROM `bckj_biz_yhxx` a where a.sjh is not null

SELECT a.owid as owid ,b.xsxh as xsxh , c.ksh as ksh, a.xm as xm ,a.xb as xb , b.xszy as xszy ,b.xsxy as xsxy ,d.zydh_One as zydhOne ,d.zydh_Two as zydhTwo , d.zydh_Three as zydhThree ,d.zydh_Four as zydhFour ,d.zydh_Five as zydhFive, d.zydh_Six as zydhSix, a.csrq as csrq , c.zzmm as zzmm ,a.mz as mz , d.kslb as kslb, d.bylb as bylb, d.zxdm as zxdm , d.zxmc as zxmc , d.syddm as syddm ,c.syd as syd , a.sfz as sfz , c.jtdz as jtdz , c. jtyb as jtyb , a.sjh as sjh ,c.jtdh as jtdh, d.kstc as kstc ,d.hjqk as hjqk, d.sjr as sjr , d.tdcj as tdcj ,d.tdzy as tdzy, d.xkkm as xkkm ,d.yw as yw ,d.sx as sx , d.wy as wy , d.wl as wl , d.hx as hx , d.sw as sw , d.zz as zz,d.dl as dl,d.js as js, d.ls as ls , d.zhcj as zhcj ,d.tkmscj as tkmscj , d.tkbycj as tkbycj ,d.tkszcj as tkszcj , c.xz as xz ,d.km as km ,d.pc as pc , a.prov as prov ,d.memo as memo , d.sg as sg ,d.tz as tz, d.jf as jf FROM `bckj_biz_yhxx` a ,`bckj_biz_yhkz` b,bckj_biz_syb c , bckj_biz_studentinfo d
a.owid = b.`YH_REF_OWID` AND b.`OLX`=#{olx} and a.yhlx=1 and b.xsxh=c.xh and b.xsxh=d.xsxh and a.owid=#{owid}
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_yhxx SET xm = #{xm}, sfz = #{sfz}, xb = #{xb}, mz = #{mz}, sfz = #{sfz}, sjh = #{sjh}, yx = #{yx} WHERE owid = #{owid}
UPDATE bckj_biz_yhxx SET xm = #{xm}, xb = #{xb}, csrq = #{csrq}, mz = #{mz}, sfz = #{sfz}, sjh = #{sjh}, prov = #{prov}, yh_dlzh=#{yhDlzh}, yh_dlmm=#{yhDlmm} WHERE owid = #{owid}
UPDATE bckj_biz_yhxx SET xm = #{xm}, xb = #{xb}, mz = #{mz}, sfz = #{sfz}, sjh = #{sjh}, yx = #{yx}, yh_dlzh=#{yhDlzh}, yh_dlmm=#{yhDlmm} WHERE owid = #{owid}
UPDATE bckj_biz_yhxx SET xb = #{xb}, xm = #{xm}, sfz = #{sfz}, csrq = #{csrq}, mz = #{mz}, sjh = #{sjh}, yx = #{yx}, yh_dlzh=#{yhDlzh}, yh_dlmm=#{yhDlmm} WHERE owid = #{owid}
UPDATE BCKJ_BIZ_YHXX SET xm=#{xm} WHERE sfz=#{sfz}
